CleverHans.wandb_logger module

class CleverHans.wandb_logger.WandbLogger(entity, project_name, config)[source]

Bases: object

A simple wrapper for logging CleverHans experiments to Weights & Biases. Supports logging of images, metrics (for example, ASR), and summary tables.

log_images(original, adversarial, misclassified, label)[source]

Log the original and adversarial images.

log_metrics(victim_model, target_class, epsilon, asr)[source]

Log a row of metrics into the results table.

log_asr(asr)[source]

Log the overall attack success rate as a scalar metric.

finalize()[source]

Log the results table and finish the session.
